title: China Consumer Price Index (CPI)
description: Consumer Price Index CPI in China decreased to 103.10 points in August from 103.20 points in July of 2022. Consumer Price Index CPI in China averaged 105.17 points from 2016 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 113.70 points in February of 2020 and a record low of 100.20 points in June of 2021. In China, the Consumer Price Index or CPI measures changes in the prices paid by consumers for a basket of goods and services. This page provides - China Consumer Price Index (CPI) - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: National Bureau of Statistics of China
